Class Description
AllCaregiverController
The AllCaregiverController contains the entire logic of the caregiver view.
AllPatientController
The AllPatientController contains the entire logic of the patient view.
AllTreatmentController
The AllTreatmentController contains the entire logic of the treatment view.
Caregiver
Caregivers work in a NURSING home and treat their patients.
CaregiverDAO
Implements the Interface DAOImp.

LoginController
The LoginController contains the entire logic of the login view.
Main  
MainWindowController
The MainWindowController contains the entire logic of the mainWindow view.
NewTreatmentController
The NewTreatmentController contains the entire logic of the treatment view when creating a new treatment.
Patient
Patients live in a NURSING home and are treated by nurses.
PatientDAO
Implements the Interface DAOImp.
Person
Both patients and caregivers are persons and inherit params from this class.
Treatment
Treatments for patients are run through by caregivers.
TreatmentController
The TreatmentController contains the entire view of the logic of the treatment view when editing a treatment.
TreatmentDAO
Implements the Interface DAOImp.
